tool_description: Analyzes rock samples to identify formation types, age estimates, and structural characteristics for geological classification.

sample_id.description: Sample identification code from collection log

visual_description.description: Visual characteristics of the rock sample

grain_size.description: Predominant grain size: fine, medium, coarse, mixed

error_messages: Sample not found: Sample ID does not exist in collection database.

usage: Provide sample ID and physical characteristics to generate geological formation classification and age estimation.
